oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Health School Opens Monday"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; medicine; nursing; Wellington Health Center; women; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "T-B Society, Health Dept. Sponsor 18-Hour Course - Eighteen hours of health lectures will be given at Wellington Health Center, Linden and Wellington, Monday thru Wednesday." -- Photo caption reads, "Identified with Texas tuberculosis control for some years, Mrs. E.G. Edson of Beaumont, will be one of the speakers for the refresher course for negro nurses at Wellington Health Center."
